website_summaries.verdict: A great option for buyers seeking an indoor electromagnetic lock with an impressive holding force.
pros: Designed to perfectly fit in-swinging doors
LED light helps show when product is locked and unlocked
cons: Does not work with out-swinging doors or outside

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Value priced...a rare combination
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a number of Visionis products over the past couple years for use in Escape Rooms and I am well pleased with all of them, including this 600lb mag lock. In my experience, they are high quality but not high priced and their Tech Support is awesome also. I needed help in figuring out how to wire some Visionis components with non-Visionis equipment and they answered my questions quickly and accurately. I would give them 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: SER

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetic lock
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this magnetic lock. the box came with every bracket, and bolt/screw you need, the instructions and wiring diagram were easy to follow. The unit even includes a door sensor under the cover to provide feedback to the control panel for a door open buzzer. Very happy I purchased these and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: strong grip
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a refrigerator out in the lobby where customer can get drinks. The privilege was being abused so I had no choice. It works great with a few minor adjustments to make it work at the fridge door. I installed a remote switch which the cashier uses to release the magnet so customers can get their drinks.
customer_reviews.author: juan c. blacutt

customer_reviews.title: Worked and looked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, used on an automatic sliding door. Nice for the price. Will purchase again. I've installed mag locks 35 years, ordinarily I'd use name brand more costly locks, price was issue on this project. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: I think it would have been even better if we mounted closer to where the normal lock ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. It holds our front office door closed tight. I don't believe anyone would be able to get through it without the whole door coming down with it. We mounted this to the top of the door, I think it would have been even better if we mounted closer to where the normal lock was because the door does flex a little more towards the bottom than the top where the lock is.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonsFavorite

customer_reviews.title: Stone
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well itssoft cluck Dino noise may not be best thing as people push door excessively when they can’t hear it. BUT IT SERVES IT PURPOSE WELL STRONG RELIABLE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: and it turns out to be easy. The lock itself works very well
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I installed a magnetic lock (with Z & L bracket), and it turns out to be easy. The lock itself works very well, and I am happy with it. Lock surface temperature is a bit warm, which is normal. I installed it together with a stand alone access controller, and a mini access control power supply. It takes much longer time to wire the entire system than to install the lock itself. update: on 5/18/16, I chatted with the online customer service rep on fpc-security.com, and I was told that the electric coil inside the 600lb was made of aluminum, not copper.
customer_reviews.author: Huang Zhi

customer_reviews.title: Great magnet lock, twitchy sensor.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving the lock 5 stars, except for the door sensor. The lock works great and runs cool at 24 VDC. It will run hot if you don't set the jumper right. The door sensor, not so much. I'm supplementing the system with a secondary magnet. Seems to work fine with that. I have 4 installed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: 12 volt Magnetic lock
customer_reviews.text: STRONG HOLD installs on 1.25-1.5 inch thick doors- has open and close door (L.E.D) indicator " installed on left opening out door" when this mag lock is installed make sure u install an EXIT button next to the door. other wise u aint getting out - 12 volt dc is all it needs
customer_reviews.author: banks

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was a little stronger.  Cause it needed to line up perfectly to work well.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a secret door with ok google. All you have to do is say open Sesame. You do have to remember to say close Sesame to rearm the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul West

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnet which is nice. It would've been better if it came with the electrical conduit.
customer_reviews.author: Kingchips

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Have paid double for the same product
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Have paid double for the same product. Came pakaged good. Kit has all parts for a multitude of door set ups. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my trailer back door!Fast step in and out........
customer_reviews.author: E.I.G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and tough
customer_reviews.text: Super tough strength holding my cabinet in place. Easy to install but remember the two white wires coming from the front of the unit are not needed unless you are using an alarm system and want to be notified when the door is open.
customer_reviews.author: G. Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: if a large angry man wants in bad enough it's possible to overcome the magnet and gain entry.
customer_reviews.author: longbeach

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great features!
customer_reviews.text: The Z bracket is very well built with a great design! Easy to put together and did exactly what I needed. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Goggin

customer_reviews.title: ... order this item several time and it works just perfect, High quality fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I order this item several time and it works just perfect, High quality fast shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product just make sure you line of the magnet perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Malhon Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and is a lot stronger then I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: kenkendsm

customer_reviews.title: Great add on magnet lock
customer_reviews.text: Used this as an add on magnet lock for a 2 magnet hidden door bookshelf lock. Very nice premium feel and works great every time.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome they worked perfect compare these to some of the name brand and there is no difference great product thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Gutierrez

product_meta.title: Visionis FPC-5192 600 lbs Indoor Electromagnetic Lock with 600 lbs L and Z Bracket for Inswinging Door
feature_bullets: (1) VIS-ML600LED: 600lb Indoor Electric Lock with LED Sensor
(1) VIS-ZL600: l and z bracket for 600lb electromagnetic lock
These products DO NOT include a power supply
